task_intent.title: 033-add-useanomalies-hook-to-analytics-dashboard
task_intent.description: Extract the anomaly fetching logic from AnomalyWidget.tsx into a reusable useAnomalies hook following the existing UseDataResult<T> pattern established in acgs2-observability/monitoring/dashboard/src/hooks/useDashboard.ts.
